title: Introducing: REL
content:
Citing the likes of Lorde, Ellie Goulding and St.

Vincent as inspirations, it’s safe to say that LA teenager REL harbours pretty impressive ambitions. Having kicked off a Kickstarter campaign to fund her first EP with the release of her debut track, All That Bite, it’s perhaps a testament to the quality of the track that she’s already well over halfway to her funding goal. Upbeat and gloriously punchy, it’s clear she knows her way around a hook, and has the attitude to go with it. Check out All That Bite below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
